messages.msgSnippet: AND the second year. I has him both times. I m guessing you were chasing Jalen that hour!  Must have been a major Jalen chasing hour...or maybe that was
messages.messageBody:
"AND the second year. I has him both times. I'm guessing you were chasing
Jalen that hour! <G>"

Must have been a major Jalen chasing hour...or maybe that was at the point I decided I wasn't going to hear ANY speakers and gave up. sigh...
Next year he'll be 4.5 AND I'll have a husband around to help chase.
I may actually have one entire conversation. Cool.

Ren
